title: Motorola Edge (2021) and Motorola Edge Plus start receiving the stable Android 12 update
content:
Motorola is on a roll. In the last two weeks, the Lenovo-owned brand has updated several budget and mid-range smartphones to Android 12. The Moto G200 picked up the Android 12 update last week, with the Moto G50 receiving the same just a few days apart. Then earlier this week, we saw the Motorola Edge

The post Motorola Edge (2021) and Motorola Edge Plus start receiving the stable Android 12 update appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Motorola has started rolling out Android 12 to the Motorola Edge (2021) and Motorola Edge Plus. Read on to know more.
